Illustrator & Graphic Designer

Adobe Illustrator | Photoshop | InDesign | XD |After Effects | Animate | Clip Studio Paint

Illust "An Illustrator is a creative professional who combines hand-drawing and painting with digital media to produce visually captivating illustrations. They use their artistic skills and software expertise to create original artwork for print and digital publications."


Graphic "To create visual concepts, using computer software or by hand, to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate consumers. Developing the overall layout and production design for applications such as advertisements, brochures, magazines, and reports"

Front-End Web Developer

HTML5 | CSS | JS | GitHub | WordPress

Web-Dev

"A Front-End Developer is responsible for developing new user-facing features, determining the structure and design of web pages, building reusable codes, optimizing page loading times, and using a variety of markup languages to create the web pages."

Chimeric Illustration

"Make Our Lives Extra-Ordinary"

Mercutio has always, and will have a passion for Visual Arts, the fruits of bringing the vividly ethereal yet intangible qualities of a complicated phantasmagoric concept that's had months on one's mind; to those simple afternoon thoughts- to fruition; Breathing life into them, one way or another!

With goals to be a Reputable Artist and Illustrator working within a team of equally passionate individuals with amazing talent themselves! Mercutio Proudly wears their Creativity on their chest! As an Artist; Creative by trade with years of paint on their hands!

Fueled by a truly timeless passion for the Visual Arts and Dedication for Making the Intangible, Tangible.
